title: Stay in the Heart of Strasbourg, France
description: French and German influences collide in France’s cultural rich city of Strasbourg. Spend three nights at the centrally located Mercure Strasbourg Centre Hotel and enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, traditional Alsatian gingerbread on arrival, a three-course Alsace dinner with local aperitif and complimentary Wi-Fi.

title: Timeless French Elegance in the Heart of Strasbourg with Restaurant & Bar
description:
Step into the timeless elegance of the first-ever Sofitel - a five-star retreat nestled in the heart of Strasbourg’s UNESCO-listed Grande Île. This iconic hotel places you just moments from the city’s most treasured landmarks, including the majestic Notre-Dame Cathedral of Strasbourg and the picturesque, cobbled lanes of Petite-France.

After a day of exploration, indulge in the region’s celebrated gastronomy at La Brasserie or unwind with a crafted cocktail in the retro-chic Le Bar de La Brasserie. End your evening with a peaceful stroll along the river, or take in a performance at the nearby Strasbourg National Theatre - perfect finishing touches to an unforgettable stay in this enchanting European capital.
offer_address: 4 place Saint Pierre le Jeune, Strasbourg 67000, France

title: Central Strasbourg Retreat in Historic Centre with Stunning City Views
description:
Experience the allure of Strasbourg from the comfort of this centrally located gem. This luxurious property is a stone's throw from the city's historic heart, where you can explore the enchanting Petite France district, marvel at the grandeur of Strasbourg Cathedral, or indulge in the local gastronomy at a traditional winstub.

The hotel's contemporary design is a harmonious blend of comfort and elegance, offering a tranquil retreat from the city's vibrant energy. Each spacious suite is equipped with a fully functional kitchen, perfect for crafting your own Alsatian feast with fresh produce from nearby. Whether you're in town for business or a weekend escape, enjoy nearby vibrant shops, cafes and cultural landmarks.
offer_address: 4 rue de la Haute Montée, Strasbourg 67000, France

title: Stylish France Retreat in the Heart of Strasbourg with Indoor Pool
description: Discover the fairytale city of your dreams on the edge of France with a stylish stay at voco Strasbourg Centre - The Garden, an IHG Hotel. The quaint and historic city of Strasbourg is filled with curving alleyways dotted with crooked medieval houses and blooming flower boxes, hugging the Ill River which twists through the city streets. Be swept away in the charming atmosphere of this dreamy destination and revel in the comforts of this modern hotel in the heart of it all.
location_description: voco Strasbourg Centre - The Garden, an IHG Hotel
